short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you save and organize college portals, along with similar information

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The process of college admissions often produces a tangle of websites; Portaler is here to help! This extension allows you to better organize your college portals, and record additional pertinent information.

- Click on the "+" symbol to start making a new portal
- Once a portal has been created, click on it to view the details
- Portals can be deleted by clicking on the trashcan symbol
